about_the_game:
In this exciting adventure set in the nano universe, control a biological cell and engage in battles with other cells. Genome Warriors: Resistance to Invasion invites you to a survival challenge in a microscopic world.

In this roguelike top-down shooter game, progress by defeating enemies in randomly generated levels. Upgrade your cell, gain advantages with temporary boosts, and try different strategies each time.

To survive in this microscopic world, you must be quick and smart. Can you overcome the challenges and defeat the most dangerous enemies in the nano universe?

Are you ready for the battle for victory?

To survive in this microscopic world, you must be quick and smart. Can you overcome the challenges and defeat the most dangerous enemies in the nano universe?

Are you ready for the battle for victory?
name: Genome Warriors : Resistance to Invasion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
